manifest.name: postcss-pseudo-class-any-link
manifest.description: Use the proposed :any-link pseudo-class in CSS

scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...'; npm run test:js && npm run test:tape

including without limitation commercial purposes. These owners may contribute

production of creative, cultural and scientific works, or to gain reputation or
